entry.title: Taiwan Stages Military Drills to Deter Chinese Aggression
entry.content: Aerial, naval and urban-warfare exercises aim to make China’s People’s Liberation Army ‘think twice,’ a senior Taiwanese officer says.

entry.title: A Kidnapping Negotiator Gets His Biggest Test: Saving His Own Wife
entry.content: Abdullahi Tumburkai volunteers his time to help family, friends and neighbors bargain with kidnappers in what has become a crisis of abductions in Nigeria. One negotiation was especially harrowing.

entry.title: Kazakh Leader Gives Security Forces Order to Shoot Without Warning
entry.content: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev said his government had largely restored order as the country’s security forces scoured for protesters after days of unrest triggered by a fuel-price increase.
